comments:

!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.jdt.debug 4 4 Aug 27, 2004 10:12:19.906
!MESSAGE Invalid stack frame

Fixed in JDIModelPresentation. In general, there is no reason to log errors 
when computing an element's image. Since the images are computed 
asynchronously, the elements may no longer exist when it comes time to render 
them. Removed aggressive error logging.
